verbose_text: Because neither genetically deleting CD146 expression nor treating animals with the AA98 antibody completely prevents EAE from developing, but rather ameliorates its severity, we postulate that endothelial CD146 may promote the progression of EAE to its more severe stages via the preferential enrichment of pathogenic cells by the upregulation of CD146 itself or in combination with other adhesion molecules, thereby providing additional ligands for lymphocytes to adhere and transmigrate.
